titleStmt.title: A messe of pottage, very well seasoned and crumbd. With bread of life, and easie to be digested. Against the contumelious slanderers of the divine service, terming it porrage. Set forth by Gyles Calfine.
titleStmt.author: Calfine, Giles.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, 1642. Being a yeare of discidiug [sic]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
